thread.title: Energy-Efficient LED Lighting Provider Orion Schedules Q3'18 Financial Results Conference Call for Wednesday, February 7th at 10:00 am ET

author: cnbc.com
title: Energy-Efficient LED Lighting Provider Orion Schedules Q3'18 Financial Results Conference Call for Wednesday, February 7th at 10:00 am ET
text:
MANITOWOC, Wis., Jan. 31, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Orion Energy Systems , Inc. (NASDAQ:OESX) (Orion Lighting) , a provider of LED lighting and energy project solutions, today announced that it will hold its fiscal 2018 third quarter financial results conference call for analysts and investors on Wednesday, February 7, 2018, at 10:00 a.m. Eastern Time. The earnings announcement release is scheduled to issue prior to market open.
Orion's Chief Executive Officer, Mike Altschaefl, and Chief Financial Officer, Bill Hull, will host the conference call. Details of the webcast and conference call are as follows:
Date: Wednesday, February 7, 2018 at 10:00 a.m. ET (9:00 a.m. CT) Call Dial-In: Dial (877) 754-5294 or (678) 894-3013 for international Webcast & Replay URL: http://investor.oriones.com/events-and-presentations for webcast links Audio Replay: (855) 859-2056, conference ID: 9468387 (available shortly after the call through 02/14/2018)
About Orion Energy Systems
Orion is a provider of LED lighting and energy project solutions. Orion manufactures and markets connected lighting systems encompassing LED solid-state lighting and smart controls. Orion systems incorporate patented design elements that deliver significant energy efficiency, optical and thermal performance that drive financial, environmental, and work-space benefits for a wide variety of customers, including nearly 40% of the Fortune 500.
